body: hate it...~~~~
At least the teacher isn't an ugly bastard. One of the few NTR doujins with this kind of premise where I can actually stand looking at the bull.
I hate the cheating genre but the artstyle compensates.
I get that the story is an excuse to showcase the art but damn, the author could have at least tried to mix it up a little bit instead of copy pasting the standard NTR student teacher formula.

This is shaping up to be quite something, full colors, gorgeous art, and NTR that makes a job of my D... and this is only chapter 1 of 3!

And tbh, while some will bitch about NTR, we don't even know the dude getting cocked that well, so in the end, this is the purest raping than anything else.

I have read NTR that give a much more nasty feeling to it.
NTR... I like it if the Male Lead is the one doing it
sometimes i think netorare artists get paid more than vanillas. they have nice art every time.
Kire 😍

I like the art, but the story is so tired. Just once, I'd like the blackmailee to just blink a couple times and say, "Yep, we're fucking. So what?"And then walk away.

I mean, is it really THAT big a deal to the point where you'd suck and fuck some scummy dick, just to hide the fact that *gasp* highschoolers have sex?

And where's the "blackmail", really? Dude has a picture of a presumably underage girl on his phone, and he's trying to use it as leverage? You want to show it to the rest of the teaching staff and discuss the punishment? Go right ahead. She'll go tell the police that you're taking voyeur shots of underage girls, idiot.
Its just an art guys.. dont mind the story :') ..

In a way she was kind of stupid 🤐

No offense... But I was also cause by my teacher touching my girl (Not sucking though... In RL that act can just be forgiven and I literally got back in the society ... Fuck Doujins... LMAO he guy just had to win the tournament and get his recommendation again lol 😑😑😑
